${ModID}:PowerelicRelic.NAME: Powerelic
${ModID}:PowerelicRelic.FLAVOR: 它曾经是一张能力牌，现在永远成为了你的一部分，除非恩洛斯吃掉了它。
DESCRIPTIONS: 获得这张能力牌原本的效果。

${ModID}:PowerelicFormerRelic.NAME: [DNT]Powerelic
DESCRIPTIONS: NL NL (Wears off at start of next combat.)

${ModID}:PowerelicDebugRelic.NAME: Playtesting Relic
DESCRIPTIONS: This will not appear in the finished version.

${ModID}:ViolescentShard.NAME: 紫罗兰碎片
${ModID}:ViolescentShard.FLAVOR: 一件专为那些——原因不明——就是单纯无法相信风衣里是三只小狐狸的人打造的小饰品。
DESCRIPTIONS: 战斗奖励现在会包含遗物牌。
